metadata.title: CVE-2023-52494 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bus: mhi: host: Add alignment check for event ring read pointerThough we do check the event ring read pointer by "is_valid_ring_ptr"to make sure it is in the buffer range, but there is another risk thepointer may be not aligned.  Since we are expecting event ring elementsare 128 bits(struct mhi_ring_element) aligned, an unaligned read pointercould lead to multiple issues like DoS or ring buffer memory corruption.So add a alignment check for event ring read pointer.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
